description.@value: A treat tea tonight is definitely what the Dr ordered. We've been so busy lately helping a friend set up a new toddler group and today was our grand opening party! 🎉 4 hours of setting up, bending down, getting up off the floor etc is absolutely exhausting, even if I don't look 6 months pregnant 😂 There's nothing better than a plate of comfort food to restore the batteries 💛🍴

recipeInstructions.@value: Slice the chicken breasts into even sized pieces.
Place onto a baking tray and cook at 180oc for 20-25 mins until golden, crisp and cooked through.
